head.title: Paid Notice: Memorials LIEBLER, WILLIAM AMEND, MD

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Memorials LIEBLER, WILLIAM AMEND, MD

block.p: LIEBLER-William Amend, MD. A memorial service commemorating the life of Dr. William A. Liebler, who died Monday June 19, will be held on Monday, June 26 at 11AM at St. James Episcopal Church, 865 Madison Ave, New York. Those wishing to make donations in Dr. Liebler's name may do so in C/O The National Dance Institute, 594 Broadway, Rm 805, NYC 10012 and Lake Champlain Maritime Museum, 4472 Basin Harbor Rd, Vergennes, VT 05491.
